channel.title: CW Rework (Mostly a Buff)
channel.description:
Enchanted (Passive): Immune to occupation.
Magic Barrier (Day ability): Place a magic barrier on someone, preventing people from visiting the following night. [3 uses] Scrying (Day ability): You may scry one person, seeing anyone who uses a day ability on someone for the rest of the game [1 use]
Tornado (Night ability): [Same as current, now with infinite uses] Mage armor: Immune to death, even if it would bypass death immunity [1 use]
Leave any suggestions, I tried my best!

item.title: CW Rework (Mostly a Buff)
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Day ability is just an old version of Ice Ward. Scry is really situational. Tornado shouldn’t be the main ability. Boslof already said that it didn’t work. Also CW shouldn’t be occ I’m, it makes it a bad scum fake claim and serves literally no purpose. Also Mage Armor is one use so you’ll pretty much never hit anything and it’s just a straight up nerf to Reaper cause he loses 2 souls if he tries to empower reap you target. So, overall just a merf, as he can’t even prevent conversions anymore.
